page.title: 14CARPENDERS PARK ESTATE
page.content: Prior to 1935 this estate comprised of private parkland,farmland and a girls finishing school.800 dwellings were built in pre_war by St.Meryl Estates and 1151 were constructed post war by Kebbell Development Ltd.The estate was named after the daughter of the original builder,Meryl Absalom.The house types fall into distinct categories. Prices are as follows. 1_bedroom flats Â£36000,bungalows Â£59000,3_bedroom townhouses Â£56000 and detached 4_bedroom houses Â£87000.The American Base was built by the Air Ministry in 1956.The estate(area 237 acres)owes much of its popularity to its proximity to London,the M1 and M25 motorways and frequent and fast train/ underground services.Oxhey Grange built 1866,recently used as a riding stables,is now being refurbished.
